Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Nasama Resort Pool Nasama Resort Beach Nasama Resort Restaurant Nasama Resort Aerial View Vanuatu Nasama Resort &vert; Return flights • 6 nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Nasama Resort is located on the south east corner of Efate Island, just 10 minutes from Port Vila centre. This beachfront resort offers top-quality self-contained accommodation. View more View less 6 nights + flights, breakfast & transfers from $ 2079 per person share twin Flying with Solomon Airlines Enquire now Sale Period : until 16 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Solomon Airlines from Auckland, Wellington (via Auckland) or Christchurch (via Auckland) to Port Vila 6 nights accommodation Return Port Vila Airport transfers Hot a la carte breakfast daily FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of kayaks Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Beachview Studio The Beachview Studios offer stunning views of the South Pacific Ocean. Spacious and thoughtfully designed, they feature a modern tropical aesthetic, with beautifully crafted timber furniture that creates a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere. Auckland 6 night package from $2079 per person share twin Additional night from $175 per person share twin Travel 24 Nov - 11 Dec 25, 02 Feb - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 6 night package from $2079 per person share twin Additional night from $175 per person share twin Travel 24 Nov - 11 Dec 25, 02 Feb - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 6 night package from $2079 per person share twin Additional night from $175 per person share twin Travel 24 Nov - 11 Dec 25, 02 Feb - 31 Mar 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Vanuatu sightseeing optional add-ons Zipline Ziplining through the rainforest canopy provides an amazing rush, offering both stunning views and a unique perspective of the jungle. The combination of ziplines and the Skybridge, especially with the added element of canyons and ravines, makes the experience feel even more thrilling. Price from $155 per adult Price from $99 per child (5-17 yrs) Travel: 01 Jan 25-31 Mar 26 Canyon Swing A 70-meter drop at speeds of up to 120 km per hour? That’s the definition of heart-pounding excitement! The view of Mele Bay is nothing short of breathtaking as you soar through the air. It’s amazing that you can combine this with other thrilling activities like the rainforest walk and ziplining to create the ultimate adventure package. The idea of combining the adrenaline of the canyon swing with the serenity and beauty of the rainforest walk sounds like the perfect balance of nature and thrill. Whether you’re going solo or sharing the excitement with a tandem swing, it seems like Vanuatu offers the perfect mix of adventure and unforgettable views. Price from $155 per adult Price from $115 per child (10-17 yrs) Travel: 01 Jan 25-31 Mar 26 Vanuatu Skybridge & Summit Garden The Vanuatu rainforest and lookout experience sounds like a perfect blend of adventure and serenity! It's a wonderful way to immerse yourself in the beauty of nature at a leisurely pace, while still having the chance to witness the thrill-seekers zipping by or swinging on the Giant Swing. The panoramic views from the palm garden lookout and Vanuatu Skybridge must be breathtaking, especially with the canyon and waterfall as a backdrop. Price from $55 per adult Price from $49 per child (4-17 yrs) Travel: 01 Jan 25-31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Sales to 16 Nov 25 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 09 Oct 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return economy class flying Solomon Airlines to Port Vila from Auckland, Wellington (via Auckland) or Christchurch (via Auckland). Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Flights depart Auckland to Port Vila on Monday, Tuesdays and Thursdays. Flights depart Port Vila to Auckland on Monday, Wednesdays and Thursdays. • Flights from Christchurch (via Auckland) to Port Vila are based on Thursday departures. Flights from Wellington (via Auckland) to Port Vila are based on Tuesday departures. • Travel dates specified are subject to departure days from NZ and are subject to change based on availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits much be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding. • Where Kids eat free this is based on 1 child per paying adult up to 2 kids 2-11yrs. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. Click here for finance terms and conditions. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 13 Oct 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
